name: Shooting Quasar Dragon
effectText:
1 Tuner Synchro Monster + 2+ non-Tuner Synchro Monsters
Must be Synchro Summoned. This card can attack a number of times each Battle Phase, up to the number of non-Tuners used for its Synchro Summon. Once per turn, when a card or effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it. When this face-up card leaves the field: You can Special Summon 1 "Shooting Star Dragon" from your Extra Deck.
